jobInfo.jobName: 云平台运维工程师(AS)(成都)
jobInfo.postDescription:
工作职责:
1.	负责微软云平台日常业务系统维护，处理各类应急响应事件和系统故障；
2.	部署和完善运维支持体系，提高运维工作效率，优化运维流程
3.	参与设计与开发Devops工具，包括但不限于容量规划、资源管理、故障分析、性能调优等；
4.	积累运维最佳实践，为业务架构设计与组件选型提供指导。
5.	负责核心生产业务系统及其相关子系统的服务稳定性
6.	通过不断的技术创新和应用，提升核心系统的稳定性，实现容灾和弹性可伸缩
7.	配合相关部门，提供各类运维支持和保障服务
8.	提供7*24小时OnCall技术支持服务，5*8工作时间服务
【Job Description】
Responsible for the daily system operation and maintenance of Microsoft 365 cloud products in China to ensure that Microsoft 365 can provide stable services to Chinese users
Respond to and handle all kinds of emergencies or alarms and meet SLA requirements, so that services can be quickly restored to normal
Support the deployment, changes, tests, and launch new services or features of Microsoft 365 GA in China
Complete version updates and upgrades, patch fixes and configuration changes, and health status monitoring and detection of Microsoft 365 components
Daily communicate with Microsoft oversea team, including email and online meetings
* Deal with the problems encountered by customers and the needs from customers
Through tool development, process optimization, and team knowledge accumulation, we continue to improve the team's operation and maintenance efficiency
* Cooperate with other departments to complete Microsoft cloud service-related work, and cooperate with the completion of security audits and compliance audits
Take other tasks assigned by departments and superiors
* Support and participate in company-led projects related to Microsoft cloud products
It has a 7*24-hour On Call role, as well as a morning shift (6AM-3PM), day shift (9AM-6PM) shift system, and a 5*8 work system
任职资格:
1.	计算机相关专业，深入理解Windows/Linux系统，精通TCP/IP、HTTP等协议，具备扎实的网络、计算机体系结构方面的知识
2.	本科及以上学历
3.	熟悉自动变更、高可用、容灾等运维系统建设，对高可用能力和效能的提升有深刻的理解和实践
4.	具有独立完成复杂问题的经历，能够完成完备的运维文档，良好的沟通技巧和主人翁责任感
5.	熟悉至少一门编程语言，PowerShell/Python/.Net 不限，能开发工具提升效率
6.	热爱技术，责任感强，拥有强大的项目执行力和良好的沟通协作能力
7.	工作细致，善于思考，有较强的分析和解决问题的能力
8.	具备良好的沟通协调能力，能独挡一面，也擅长团队作战
9.	有良好的工作文档习惯，及时按要求撰写更新工作流程及技术文档
10.	了解业界前沿技术，乐于尝试新事物，具有很强的问题解决能力，良好的技术敏感度
【Job Requirements】
Bachelor degree or above, major in computer science will be better
Familiar with the deployment, client installation and use of mainstream Microsoft Office or Microsoft 365 products, including but not limited to Outlook/OneNote/SharePoint/OneDrive/Teams
Familiar with the construction, setup, and use of the mainstream version of the Windows Server operating system and the main roles, including but not limited to AD/DNS/DHCP/WSUS
Understand the basics of cloud computing, understand the fundamentals of virtualization, and understand mainstream virtualization platforms or tools such as Hyper-V or VMWare
Understand the structure of computer systems, and understand the hardware environment such as servers, network equipment, and storage devices
Learn the basics of networking, including TCP/IP, HTTPS, Route, CDN, PKI and more
Understand the principles, construction, configuration and use of mainstream databases, including SQL Server
Professional certifications will be of interest to us. If it is an MS cloud certification, you will get extra points in the interview, such as AZ104+, MS740+, MS102+, etc.
Have a strong sense of responsibility and good execution, have independent thinking ability and strong ability to work under pressure, and be good at summarizing and self-learning
Strong English on listening and oral communication skills, because you will online work with global tech teams
Good senses on teamwork
Worked on the tech position 3 years+
jobInfo.address: 成都武侯区来福士广场-T1写字楼来福士大厦T1-2802

brandComInfo.introduce: ，在中国大陆运营国际水准的Microsoft Azure，Microsoft 365，Dynamics 365和 Power Platform等云服务，并率先为中国用户引入国际领先的云应用及解决方案，助力海内外云服务商落地中国。公司拥有一支由数百人组成的，具备国际一流服务保障水准的云计算运营团队，为客户提供包括IaaS、PaaS、SaaS在内的全方位云服务，推动中国云计算产业加速合作，向多赢的云生态体系的发展。
